title: 后台报错
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1324896458 于 2020-6-12 21:04 编辑 

装了CustomBlocks插件之后，只要挖设定的方块就会出现[20:57:12] [Server thread/INFO]: CONSOLE issued server command: /eco give %player% 0.01!
[20:57:12] [Server thread/INFO]: [0;31;1m错误:[0;31;22m[0;31;22m玩家未在线（或不存在）[m
[20:57:12] [Server thread/ERROR]: Could not pass event BlockBreakEvent to CustomBlocks v1.0
org.bukkit.event.EventException: null
        at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPluginLoader$1.execute(JavaPluginLoader.java:298) ~[server.jar:git-Bukkit-e60fc34]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.RegisteredListener.callEvent(RegisteredListener.java:62) ~[server.jar:git-Bukkit-e60fc34]

        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.PlayerInteractManager.breakBlock(PlayerInteractManager.java:290) [server.jar:git-Bukkit-e60fc34]

        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.PacketPlayInBlockDig.a(SourceFile:10) [server.jar:git-Bukkit-e60fc34]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.PlayerConnectionUtils$1.run(SourceFile:13) [server.jar:git-Bukkit-e60fc34]
        at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_222]
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_222]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.SystemUtils.a(SourceFile:46) [server.jar:git-Bukkit-e60fc34]

Caused by: java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: Index: 1, Size: 1
        at java.util.Collections$SingletonList.get(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_222]

求问：1.这个插件有没有支持玩家名字的变量
2.后面那一长串是什么
log文件



latest.log
(62.56 KB, 下载次数: 1)



2020-6-12 20:58 上传

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
Caused by: java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: Index: 1, Size: 1
        at java.util.Collections$SingletonList.get(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_222]
        at it.opscrashed.customblocks.events.MineEvent.onMine(MineEvent.kt:52) ~[?:?]

看上去是这个插件自己的问题，更新或者删除吧

replies.author: Ender_Rain_
replies.txt_content: emmm，讲真，你直接做个指令商店，挖掘方块没必要，最骚的是挖了还不掉方块（氵一下）
